delay.description: Amount of time (in ticks) until the teleport will be triggered

location.description: where this will teleport the player

sound.description: The sounds this plays when it sucessfully triggers

transforms.description: The blocks this can convert and what they convert to

id.description: This is used to determine what the dynamic proeprty gets read/saved as (IDs of the same value will share the same info for that player)

can_store_items.description: Can this item store items that can later be used in recipes? (Currently stored items are bound to that player and not the item)

can_show_item_upgrades.description: Can this show availble upgrade to items

storage_capacity_limit.description: The max amount of unique items this can store

name.description: The name of the item (This will be used in things like the UI titles)

debug_mode.description: Enables debug options for this item

poke_pfe:icon_path.title: Icon Path (PFE)
poke_pfe:icon_path.description: This will control what the texture path of this item is. This will be used in scripting where the icon would not be known otherwise

sneaking_stops_this.description: Will this componet not activate if the player is sneaking

grant_effect.description: An effect to grant the user when this component activates

effect.description: The identifier of the effect to apply to the user

duration.description: The amount of time (in ticks) this effect will last for

particles.description: Will the effect's particles be emmited

vertical_strength.description: The amount of vertical (Y) force to apply to the user

horizontal_strength.description: The amount of horizontal (X/Z) force to apply to the user

take_durability.description: Will this item take durability when this triggers

trigger_cooldown.description: Will this component triggering cause this item to go on cooldown

play_sound.description: Will this item play a sound when this component triggers

spawn_particles.description: An array of particle identifiers that willl be spawned when this component triggers

no_repeat_id.description:
This will stop this from re-applying items with the same id
This will not stop `radius_per_piece` from taking be applied

radius_per_piece.description: The amout the radius increases per piece of same id is equipped

max_amp.description: The maximum amp this piece can allow

mode.description:
What mode is this effect
Command mode: run a command when set effects trigger

bind_to.description: In what context does this command execute

disable_check.description: If this effect can be disabled from the config & if so what option disables it

no_repeat_id.description: This id will be used to prevent an effect with the same id from triggering

box_size.description: Length: number, Width: number, Height number

offset.description: X: number , Y: number , Z: number

poke_pfe:play_music.title: Play Music (PFE)
poke_pfe:play_music.description: Allows the item to play music when it is used

music_fade_amount.description: The amount of seconds the previous track will fade out by

queue_message.description: The translation string that will be displayed as a message in the chat when the player queues this track

poke_pfe:run_command.title: Run Command (PFE)
poke_pfe:run_command.description: Allows the item to run a command when it is used

version.description:
The version of this component. this is used to prevent breaking with outdated versions of this component's info
Current version: 1

poke_pfe:custom_quests_info.description:
Quest (PFE)

Additional options for having custom quests on this item

version.description:
The version of this component. this is used to prevent breaking with outdated versions of this component's info
Current version: 1

custom_quest_dynamic_property.description: The dynamic property custom quests would get saved to

poke_pfe:quests.description:
Quest (PFE)

When this item is used: this item will generate a quest that the player can complete for a reward

translationString.description: the display name of the required item

poke_pfe:waypoint_menu.description:
Waypoin Menu (PFE)

When this item is used: this item will open a waypoint GUI

version.description:
The version of this component. this is used to prevent breaking with outdated versions of this component's info
Current version: 1

max_waypoints.description: The maximum amount of waypoints this item can store

debug_mode.description: Adds the Debug mode button to the GUI

minecraft:allow_off_hand.title: minecraft:allow_off_hand
minecraft:allow_off_hand.description: The allow_off_hand component determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot of the inventory.

value.description: Determines whether the item can be placed in the off hand slot.

minecraft:block_placer.title: minecraft:block_placer
minecraft:block_placer.description:
Items with the block_placer component will place a block when used. 
This component can also be used instead of the "minecraft:icon" component to render the referenced block as the item icon.

block.description: Defines the block that will be placed.

replace_block_item.description: If true, the item will be registered as the item for this block. This item will be returned by default when the block is broken/picked. Note: the identifier for this item must match the block's identifier for this field to be valid.

use_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

minecraft:bundle_interaction.title: minecraft:bundle_interaction
minecraft:bundle_interaction.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Adds bundle-specific interactions and tooltip to the item. Requires a "minecraft:storage_item" component.

num_viewable_slots.description: The maximum number of slots in the bundle viewable by the plater. Can be from 1 to 64. Default is 12.

minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative.title: minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative
minecraft:can_destroy_in_creative.description: The can_destroy_in_creative component determines if the item can be used by a player to break blocks when in creative mode.

value.description: Determines whether the item can be used to destroy blocks while in creative mode.

minecraft:compostable.title: minecraft:compostable
minecraft:compostable.description: Specifies that an item is compostable and provides the chance of creating a composting layer in the composter

composting_chance.description: The chance of this item to create a layer upon composting with the composter. Valid value range is 1 - 100 inclusive

minecraft:cooldown.title: minecraft:cooldown
minecraft:cooldown.description: After you use an item, all items specified with the same `cool down category` setting becomes unusable for the duration specified by the 'cool down time' setting in this component.

category.description: The type of cool down for this item. All items with a cool down component with the same category are put on cool down when one is used.

duration.description: The duration of time (in seconds) items with a matching category will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.

minecraft:custom_components.title: minecraft:custom_components
minecraft:custom_components.description: Specifies an array of custom components defined in a script that should be added to this item.

minecraft:damage.title: minecraft:damage
minecraft:damage.description: The damage component determines how much extra damage the item does on attack.

value.description: Specifies how much extra damage the item does, must be a positive number.

minecraft:damage_absorption.title: minecraft:damage_absorption
minecraft:damage_absorption.description: It allows an item to absorb damage that would otherwise be dealt to its wearer. For this to happen, the item needs to be equipped in an armor slot. The absorbed damage reduces the item's durability, with any excess damage being ignored. Because of this, the item also needs a `minecraft:durability` component.

absorbable_causes.description: List of damage causes that can be absorbed by the item. By default, no damage cause is absorbed.

minecraft:digger.title: minecraft:digger
minecraft:digger.description: Digger item component specifies how quickly this item can dig specific blocks.

destroy_speeds.description: A list of blocks to dig with correlating speeds of digging.

speed.description: Digging speed for the correlating block(s).

use_efficiency.description: Determines whether this item should be impacted if the efficiency enchantment is applied to it.

minecraft:display_name.title: minecraft:display_name
minecraft:display_name.description: The display_name item component specifies the text shown whenever an item's name is displayed, like in hover text.

minecraft:durability.title: minecraft:durability
minecraft:durability.description: The durability item component specifies how much damage the item takes before breaking, and allows the item to be combined to repair or augment them.

damage_chance.description: Specifies the percentage chance of this item losing durability. Default is set to 100. Defined as an int range with min and max value.

max_durability.description: Max durability is the amount of damage that this item can take before breaking. This is a required parameter and has a minimum of 0.

minecraft:durability_sensor.title: minecraft:durability_sensor
minecraft:durability_sensor.description: Enables an item to emit effects when it receives damage. Because of this, the item also needs a `minecraft:durability` component.

durability_thresholds.description: The list of both durability thresholds and effects emitted when each threshold is met. When multiple thresholds are met, only the threshold with the lowest durability after applying the damage is considered.

items.description: Defines both the durability threshold, and the effects emitted when that threshold is met.
items.title: minecraft:durability_sensor durability_threshold

durability.description: The effects are emitted when the item durability value is less than or equal to this value.

particle_type.title: enum ParticleType
particle_type.description: Particle effect to emit when the threshold is met.

sound_event.title: enum SharedTypes::Legacy::LevelSoundEvent
sound_event.description: Sound effect to emit when the threshold is met.

minecraft:enchantable.title: minecraft:enchantable
minecraft:enchantable.description: The enchantable component specifies what enchantments can be applied to the item. Not all enchantments will have an effect on all item components.

slot.description: Specifies which types of enchantments can be applied. For example, `bow` would allow this item to be enchanted as if it were a bow.

value.description: Specifies the value of the enchantment (minimum of 0).

minecraft:entity_placer.title: minecraft:entity_placer
minecraft:entity_placer.description: The entity_placer item component specifies the blocks that the item can be placed on.

dispense_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be dispensed on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

entity.description: The entity to be placed in the world.

use_on.description: List of block descriptors of the blocks that this item can be used on. If left empty, all blocks will be allowed.

minecraft:food.title: minecraft:food
minecraft:food.description: When an item has a food component, it becomes edible to the player. Must have the 'minecraft:use_duration' component in order to function properly.

can_always_eat.description: If true you can always eat this item (even when not hungry). Default is set to false.

nutrition.description: Value that is added to the entity's nutrition when the item is used. Default is set to 0.

saturation_modifier.description: saturation_modifier is used in this formula: (nutrition * saturation_modifier * 2) when applying the saturation buff. Default is set to 0.6.

using_converts_to.description: When used, converts to the item specified by the string in this field. Default does not convert item.

minecraft:fuel.title: minecraft:fuel
minecraft:fuel.description: Fuel item component allows this item to be used as fuel in a furnace to 'cook' other items.

duration.description: Amount of time, in seconds, this fuel will cook items.

minecraft:glint.title: minecraft:glint
minecraft:glint.description: The glint component determines whether the item has the enchanted glint render effect on it.

value.description: Determines whether the item has the glint effect.

minecraft:hand_equipped.title: minecraft:hand_equipped
minecraft:hand_equipped.description: The hand_equipped component determines if an item is rendered like a tool while it is in a player's hand.

value.description: Determines whether the item is rendered like a tool while in the player's hand.

minecraft:hover_text_color.title: minecraft:hover_text_color
minecraft:hover_text_color.description: The hover_text_color component specifies the color of the item name when the players hovers the cursor over the item.

value.description: Specifies the color of the item's hover text.

minecraft:icon.title: minecraft:icon v1.21.80
minecraft:icon.description: Icon item component determines which icon graphic will be used to represent the item in the UI and elsewhere.

textures.description: This map contains the different textures that can be used for the item's icon. Default will contain the actual icon texture. Armor trim textures and palettes and bundle open textures can be specified here too. The icon textures are the keys from the resource_pack/textures/item_texture.json 'texture_data' object associated with the texture file.

minecraft:interact_button.title: minecraft:interact_button
minecraft:interact_button.description: This component is a boolean or string that determines if the interact button is shown in touch controls and what text is displayed on the button. When set as true, default "Use Item" text will be displayed.

minecraft:liquid_clipped.title: minecraft:liquid_clipped
minecraft:liquid_clipped.description: The liquid_clipped component determines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

value.description: Deterines whether the item interacts with liquid blocks on use.

minecraft:max_stack_size.title: minecraft:max_stack_size
minecraft:max_stack_size.description: The max_stack_size component specifies how many of the item can be stacked together.

value.description: Specifies how many of the item that can be stacked.

minecraft:projectile.title: minecraft:projectile
minecraft:projectile.description: Projectile items shoot out, like an arrow.

minimum_critical_power.description: Specifies how long a player must charge a projectile for it to critically hit.

projectile_entity.description: Which entity is to be fired as a projectile.

minecraft:rarity.title: minecraft:rarity
minecraft:rarity.description: Specifies the base rarity and subsequently color of the item name when the player hovers the cursor over the item.

value.description: Sets the base rarity of the item. The rarity of an item automatically increases when enchanted, either to Rare when the base rarity is Common or Uncommon, or Epic when the base rarity is Rare.

minecraft:record.title: minecraft:record
minecraft:record.description: Record Item Component. Used by record items to play music.

comparator_signal.description: Specifies signal strength for comparator blocks to use, from 1 - 15.

duration.description: Specifies duration of sound event in seconds, float value.

sound_event.title: enum SharedTypes::Legacy::LevelSoundEvent
sound_event.description: Sound event type: 13, cat, blocks, chirp, far, mall, mellohi, stal, strad, ward, 11, wait, pigstep, otherside, 5, relic.

minecraft:repairable.title: minecraft:repairable
minecraft:repairable.description: The repairable item component specifies which items can be used to repair this item, along with how much durability is gained.

repair_items.description: List of repair item entries. Each entry needs to define a list of strings for `items` that can be used for the repair and an optional `repair_amount` for how much durability is gained.

items.description: Items that may be used to repair an item.

repair_amount.description: How much the item is repaired.
repair_amount.title: Molang expression

search_inventory.description: Can search inventory? Default is set to false.

use_in_creative.description: Can use in creative mode? Default is set to false.

use_offhand.description: Can use off-hand? Default is set to false.

charge_on_draw.description: Charge on draw? Default is set to false.

max_draw_duration.description: Draw Duration. Default is set to 0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Scale power by draw duration? Default is set to false.

minecraft:should_despawn.title: minecraft:should_despawn
minecraft:should_despawn.description: Should_despawn component determines if the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world

value.description: Determines whether the item should eventually despawn while floating in the world.

minecraft:stacked_by_data.title: minecraft:stacked_by_data
minecraft:stacked_by_data.description: The stacked_by_data component determines whether the same items with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item entities can merge while floating in the world.

value.description: Determines whether the same item with different aux values can stack. Also defines whether the item entities can merge while floating in the world.

minecraft:storage_item.title: minecraft:storage_item
minecraft:storage_item.description: [EXPERIMENTAL] Storage Items can be used by other components to store other items within this item.

allow_nested_storage_items.description: Determines whether another Storage Item is allowed inside of this item. Default is true.

allowed_items.description: List of items that are exclusively allowed in this Storage Item. If empty all items are allowed.

banned_items.description: List of items that are not allowed in this Storage Item.

max_slots.description: The maximum allowed weight of the sum of all contained items. Maximum is 64. Default is 64.

minecraft:storage_weight_limit.title: minecraft:storage_weight_limit
minecraft:storage_weight_limit.description: Specifies the maximum weight limit that a storage item can hold

max_weight_limit.description: The maximum allowed weight of the sum of all contained items. Maximum is 64. Default is 64.

minecraft:storage_weight_modifier.title: minecraft:storage_weight_modifier
minecraft:storage_weight_modifier.description: Specifies the maximum weight limit that a storage item can hold

weight_in_storage_item.description: The weight of this item when inside another Storage Item. Default is 4. 0 means item is not allowed in another Storage Item.

minecraft:tags.title: minecraft:tags
minecraft:tags.description: The tags component specifies which tags an item has on it.

tags.description: An array that can contain multiple item tags.

minecraft:throwable.title: minecraft:throwable
minecraft:throwable.description: Throwable items can be thrown by the player, such as a snowball.

do_swing_animation.description: Determines whether the item should use the swing animation when thrown. Default is set to false.

launch_power_scale.description: The scale at which the power of the throw increases. Default is set to 1.0.

max_draw_duration.description: The maximum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

max_launch_power.description: The maximum power to launch the throwable item. Default is set to 1.0.

min_draw_duration.description: The minimum duration to draw a throwable item. Default is set to 0.0.

scale_power_by_draw_duration.description: Whether or not the power of the throw increases with duration charged. Default is set to false.

minecraft:use_animation.title: minecraft:use_animation
minecraft:use_animation.description: Use_animation specifies which animation is played when the player uses the item.

value.title: enum SharedTypes::Legacy::UseAnimation
value.description: Specifies which animation to play when the the item is used.

minecraft:use_modifiers.title: minecraft:use_modifiers
minecraft:use_modifiers.description: This component modifies use effects, including how long the item takes to use and the player's speed when used in combination with components like "shooter", "throwable", or "food".

movement_modifier.description: Modifier value to scale the players movement speed when item is in use.

use_duration.description: How long the item takes to use in seconds.

minecraft:wearable.title: minecraft:wearable
minecraft:wearable.description: Wearable items can be worn by a player in a specified slot.

hides_player_location.description: Determines whether the Player's location is hidden on Locator Maps and the Locator Bar when the wearable item is worn. Default is false.

protection.description: How much protection the wearable item provides. Default is set to 0.

slot.title: enum SharedTypes::Legacy::EquipmentSlot
slot.description: Specifies where the item can be worn. If any non-hand slot is chosen, the max stack size is set to 1.

poke_pfe:spawn_item.title: Spawn Item (PFE)
poke_pfe:spawn_item.description: Spawn an item at a given location, can also be set to place it into containers

poke_pfe:transform_block.title: Transform Block (PFE)
poke_pfe:transform_block.description:
[On Tick]
Allows you to convert this block to a different one

targets.description: The direction that this block can place a block directly adjacent to itself

can_replace.description: What blocks can be replaced by this (defaults to only Air when ommited)

targets.description: The direction that this block can break adjacent blocks

sound.description: The sounds this plays when it sucessfully triggers

poke_pfe:sponge_block.title: Sponge Block (PFE)
poke_pfe:sponge_block.description:
[On Tick & On Place]
Allows this block to "absorb" adjacent blocks

check_for_blocks.description: The blocks it will check for & The blocks that this will replace

adds_to_stat.description: (For Computer Craft Add-On Integration) What stat this adds to

sound.description: The sounds this plays when it sucessfully triggers

sponge_size.description: The area centered around the block to be affected by this [X,Y,Z]

offset.description: The offset that is applied to ``sponge_size``

poke_pfe:icon_path.title: Icon Path (PFE)
poke_pfe:icon_path.description:
[Data Only]
This will control what the texture path of this block is. This will be used in scripting where the icon would not be known otherwise

poke_pfe:custom_recipes.title: Custom Recipes (PFE)
poke_pfe:custom_recipes.description:
[Data Only]
These are recipes that are used in the Recipe Block (PFE) Component

items.description:
The items used in this recipe
(Amount):(Identifier)

result.description:
The item(s) granted from this recipe
(Amount):(Identifier)

recipe_type.description: The type of recipe this is

id.description: This is used to determine what the dynamic proeprty gets read/saved as (IDs of the same value will share the same info for that player)

can_store_items.description: Can this block store items that can later be used in recipes? (Stored items are bound to that player not the block)

can_show_item_upgrades.description: Can this show availble upgrade to items

storage_capacity_limit.description: The max amount of unique items this can store

name.description: The name of the block (This will be used in things like the UI titles)

debug_mode.description: Enables debug options for this block

poke_pfe:transform_block.title: Transform Block (PFE)
poke_pfe:transform_block.description:
[On Tick]
Allows you to convert this block to a different one

targets.description: The direction that this block can place a block directly adjacent to itself

can_replace.description: What blocks can be replaced by this (defaults to only Air when ommited)

targets.description: The direction that this block can break adjacent blocks

sound.description: The sounds this plays when it sucessfully triggers

poke_pfe:sponge_block.title: Sponge Block (PFE)
poke_pfe:sponge_block.description:
[On Tick & On Place]
Allows this block to "absorb" adjacent blocks

check_for_blocks.description: The blocks it will check for & The blocks that this will replace

adds_to_stat.description: (For Computer Craft Add-On Integration) What stat this adds to

sound.description: The sounds this plays when it sucessfully triggers

sponge_size.description: The area centered around the block to be affected by this [X,Y,Z]

offset.description: The offset that is applied to ``sponge_size``

poke_pfe:icon_path.title: Icon Path (PFE)
poke_pfe:icon_path.description:
[Data Only]
This will control what the texture path of this block is. This will be used in scripting where the icon would not be known otherwise

poke_pfe:custom_recipes.title: Custom Recipes (PFE)
poke_pfe:custom_recipes.description:
[Data Only]
These are recipes that are used in the Recipe Block (PFE) Component

items.description:
The items used in this recipe
(Amount):(Identifier)

result.description:
The item(s) granted from this recipe
(Amount):(Identifier)

recipe_type.description: The type of recipe this is

id.description: This is used to determine what the dynamic proeprty gets read/saved as (IDs of the same value will share the same info for that player)

can_store_items.description: Can this block store items that can later be used in recipes? (Stored items are bound to that player not the block)

can_show_item_upgrades.description: Can this show availble upgrade to items

storage_capacity_limit.description: The max amount of unique items this can store

name.description: The name of the block (This will be used in things like the UI titles)

debug_mode.description: Enables debug options for this block

flipbook_texture.description: Path to the graphic file for one or more faces of a block

atlas_index.description: Index of the first frame to display when beginning the animation. If a problem occurs, then only this frame will be displayed.

atlas_tile.description: Name of the graphic that will be shown on the block if there is a problem with the animation.

atlas_tile_variant.description: An alternate graphic to display as the atlas tile.

ticks_per_frame.description: How many ticks (1/20th of one second) of game time should pass before the next frame is displayed.

frames.description: An array of frame numbers, used to show what order to display the frames.

blend_frames.description: Makes the frames more smoothly transition into the next

minecraft:behavior.circle_around_anchor.title: minecraft:behavior.circle_around_anchor
minecraft:behavior.circle_around_anchor.description: Causes an entity to circle around an anchor point placed near a point or target.

angle_change.description: Number of degrees to change this entity's facing by, when the entity selects its next anchor point. Default value: 15.0.

goal_radius.description: Maximum distance from the anchor-point in which this entity considers itself to have reached the anchor point. This is to prevent the entity from bouncing back and forth trying to reach a specific spot. Default value: 0.500000.

height_above_target_range.description: The number of blocks above the target that the next anchor point can be set. This value is used only when the entity is tracking a target. Default value: [0.0, 0.0].
height_above_target_range.title: FloatRange

height_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase or decrease the current height around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. "height_change_chance" is deprecated and has been replaced with "height_adjustment_chance". Default value: 0.003.

height_offset_range.description: Vertical distance from the anchor point this entity must stay within, upon a successful height adjustment. Default value: [0.0, 0.0].
height_offset_range.title: FloatRange

radius_adjustment_chance.description: Percent chance to determine how often to increase the size of the current movement radius around the anchor point. 1 = 100%. "radius_change_chance" is deprecated and has been replaced with "radius_adjustment_chance". Default value: 0.0.

radius_change.description: The number of blocks to increase the current movement radius by, upon successful "radius_adjustment_chance". If the current radius increases over the range maximum, the current radius will be set back to the range minimum and the entity will change between clockwise and counter-clockwise movement. Default value: 1.

radius_range.description: Horizontal distance from the anchor point this entity must stay within upon a successful radius adjustment. Default value: [5.0, 5.0].

speed_multiplier.description: Multiplies the speed at which this entity travels to its next desired position. Default value: 1.0.
